shloka:
किरीटिनं गदिनं चक्रिणं च
तेजोराशिं सर्वतोदीप्तिमन्तम्।
पश्यामि त्वां दुर्निरीक्ष्यं समन्ता
द्दीप्तानलार्कद्युतिमप्रमेयम्।।11.17।।
translation: 11.17 I see Thee with the diadem, the club and the discus, a mass of radiance shining  everywhere, very hard to look at, blazing all round like burning fire and the sun, and immeasurable.
